explains: n. 刚毅；不屈不挠；勇气

sentences.en: They bore their plight with stoicism and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 他们以坚忍刚毅的精神面对困境。

sentences.en: He suffered a long series of illnesses with tremendous dignity and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 他在病魔的长久折磨下表现出了高度的尊严和刚毅。

sentences.en: This is the kind of fortitude we must have.
